data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of At-Ta'mim to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of At-Ta‘mim, Iraq
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 1,376,880, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of At-Ta‘mim, Iraq that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in At-Ta‘mim, Iraq a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Arab, Arabic Gulf Spoken people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 2,855 believers living in the state of At-Ta'mim. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in At-Ta'mim that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.section_summary:
the state of At-Ta‘mim, Iraq has a population of 1,395,600.

We estimate At-Ta'mim has 2,855 people who might know Jesus, 15,865 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,376,880 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 488 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of At-Ta‘mim, Iraq.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.
